channel.title: Dark Soulz Pking
channel.description:
````Dark_Slouz_Pking will be released december 1st 08.````
Features:
*All skills work like they should. *Custom mini game called "Revenge of war" (yet to be specified) *Max money is the usual 2147M *Castle wars, clan wars, god wars all work *10 custom quests (each giving items, money and xp lamps) *Moderate training *Great training areas *All monsters drop what they drop in rs *Another new and custom minigame (look below to find out about it) *Commands *specs work on all weapons that can spec *Pking is all over so watch out *Pray icons work!!! *Some custom Weapons that work with mopar and silab *skill capes that work with mopar (took me ages)
Custom MiniGame:
Guthix predjudice
*teams will battle through vast stages of battle *each 10 waves a bank will apear for 3mins *finishing will gain you weapons that are custom to this game *the rewards would make you very rich (each selling at about 2000M) *you have 3 lives, so you can die 3 times before you are kicked out of the minigame *You MUST have at least 150pk points to enter the minigame
Side note: You can buy pking points, but very expencive (1pk point = 10M) that equals 1500M
To become an admin or mod you must complete a almost impossibe quest:
[PART 1] To even start you must be over level 100, completed all other quests and have 14M xp in any stat.
[PART 2] To start you must wear a firecape, Dragon chain, Dragon legs, Ranger Boots, Archers Ring, Whip and crystal shield and talk to 'Lumbride guide' but wear is he? somewhere in varrock.
[PART 3] Yet to be revealed.
I will be uploading some images soon

item.title: Dark Soulz Pking
item.dc:creator: @Death_Slayer Death_Slayer
item.description:
@Death_Slayer wrote:

Dark_Slouz_Pking will be released december 1st 08.

Features:

*All skills work like they should.
*Custom mini game called “Revenge of war” (yet to be specified)
*Max money is the usual 2147M
*Castle wars, clan wars, god wars all work
*10 custom quests (each giving items, money and xp lamps)
*Moderate training
*Great training areas
*All monsters drop what they drop in rs
*Another new and custom minigame (look below to find out about it)
*Commands
*specs work on all weapons that can spec
*Pking is all over so watch out
*Pray icons work!!!
*Some custom Weapons that work with mopar and silab
*skill capes that work with mopar (took me ages)

Custom MiniGame:

Guthix predjudice

*teams will battle through vast stages of battle
*each 10 waves a bank will apear for 3mins
*finishing will gain you weapons that are custom to this game
*the rewards would make you very rich (each selling at about 2000M)
*you have 3 lives, so you can die 3 times before you are kicked out of the minigame
*You MUST have at least 150pk points to enter the minigame

Side note: You can buy pking points, but very expencive (1pk point = 10M) that equals 1500M

To become an admin or mod you must complete a almost impossibe quest:

[PART 1]
To even start you must be over level 100, completed all other quests and have 14M xp in any stat.

[PART 2]
To start you must wear a firecape, Dragon chain, Dragon legs, Ranger Boots, Archers Ring, Whip and crystal shield and talk to ‘Lumbride guide’ but wear is he? somewhere in varrock.

[PART 3]
Yet to be revealed.

I will be uploading some images soon
